title: James Bond Book Collection - 46 Books - Epub and Mobi - Various
description:
For as long as I can remember, I have loved the James Bond book series. I actually downloaded the original Fleming novels here on the Pirate Bay, so I give this community credit for starting my love.

But here's the problem: I could only find the Fleming books and a few others on the web. They're still not widely available on the web, and that's a shame. So here's my gift to the Pirate Bay community. 46 James Bond novels, in both Epub and Mobi format. Here is a listing of the books in my collection and what I'm currently missing:

Ian Fleming:
1.  Casino Royale
2.  Live and Let Die
3.  Moonraker
4.  Diamonds are Forever
5.  From Russia With Love
6.  Doctor No
7.  Goldfinger
8.  For Your Eyes Only
9.  Thunderball
10. The Spy Who Loved Me
11. On Her Majesty's Secret Service
12. You Only Live Twice
13. The Man with the Golden Gun
14. Octopussy and the Living Daylights

Robert Markham as Kingsley Amis
1.  Colonel Sun

Christopher Wood
1.  The Spy Who Loved Me (Movie Novelization)
2.  Moonraker (Movie Novelization)


John Gardner
1.  MISSING: License Renewed
2.  For Special Services
3.  Icebreaker
4.  Role of Honour
5.  Nobody Lives Forever
6.  No Deals, Mr. Bond
7.  Scorpius
8.  MISSING: Win, Lose, or Die
9.  Licence to Kill (Movie Novelization)
10. Brokenclaw
11. The Man from Barbarossa
12. Death is Forever
13. Never Send Flowers
14. Seafire
15. Goldeneye (Movie Novelization)
16. Cold

Raymond Benson
1.  Blast From The Past
2.  Zero Minus 10
3.  Tomorrow Never Dies (Movie Novelization)
4.  The Facts of Death
5.  Midsummer Night's Doom
6.  High Time to Kill
7.  Live at Five
8.  The World is Not Enough (Movie Novelization)
9.  Doubleshot
10. Never Dream of Dying
11. The Man with the Red Tattoo
12. Die Another Day (Movie Novelization)

Sebastian Faulks
1. Devil May Care

The final two books, Carte Blanche and Solo, are missing from this collection. But they are recent novels and readily available online. Otherwise, I am missing two John Gardner books by my count. General quality of the books is high, with some minor aberrations here and there (nothing that affects readability).

This collection represents a lot of work. Please share it if you like it. And if you have a hard to find collection one day, I hope you share it with the community yourself one day. That's the greatest praise I could get for my efforts!
